displayProperties.description: "Asher called me to rant about a Taken Blight destroying a research wing of the Cabal base, and I'm like, why are you telling me? We're not friends; and then he mentions seeing one of my caches in the debris. Survived a Taken Blight. Not a bad design, if I do say so myself." â€”Cayde-6
